name: Hotel Spunta di Mare

reviews.text: Hotel ideal for a first night in Corsica after a late arrival at the airport, very easy to find. People were friendly and the food a bit like very tasty home cooking (2 menus to choose from). We were in the part without a lift: not recommended if you have back problems ... The room was clean and functional. I would probably not stay for more than 1 or 2 nights as the area is not the nicest on the island and the hotel correct with regard to its price category bot not exactly homely.
reviews.title: Simple, functional and not far from airport

aka: Hotel Spunta Di Mare Ajaccio, Corsica
